Pre-Game Insights: Scotland's last assignment in the shortest format came at the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024. They failed to qualify for the Super 8 stage after finishing third in Group B.
The upcoming series will be a great opportunity for the Scots to show that they belong.
Australia's last assignment was the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024 where they failed to make it to the semis.
Cooper Connolly, Aaron Hardie, Xavier Bartlett and Jake Fraser-McGurk have been called up to the national T20 side.
Miscellaneous Highlights: This is Scotland's first time hosting Australia since the one-off ODI in 2013.
The series will be held at Grange Cricket Club in Edinburgh.
Others: Scotland's probable XI includes George Munsey, Michael Jones, Richie Berrington, Brandon McMullen, Michael Leask, Matthew Cross, Jack Jarvis, Christopher Sole, Chris Greaves, Mark Watt, Brad Wheal.

Australia's probable XI includes Travis Head, Jake Fraser-McGurk, Mitchell Marsh, Cameron Green, Marcus Stoinis, Aaron Hardie/Tim David, Josh Inglis, Xavier Bartlett, Nathan Ellis, Spencer Johnson, Adam Zampa.
The pitch is expected to be well-balanced with the seamers getting some lateral movement with the new ball.
The temperature in Edinburgh on Wednesday is expected to range between 7 and 14 degrees Celsius.
